Class RequestRecoveryMessage

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable
public class RequestRecoveryMessage
extends SystemMessage

This class represents a message used when recovering requests

public RequestRecoveryMessage()
Creates a new instance of RecoveryRequestMessage

RequestRecoveryMessage

public RequestRecoveryMessage(byte[] hash,
                              int from)
Creates a new instance of RecoveryRequestMessage, of the RR_REQUEST type

Parameters:
hash - Hash of the request being recovered
from - ID of the process which sent the message

RequestRecoveryMessage

public RequestRecoveryMessage(TOMMessage msg,
                              int from)
Creates a new instance of RecoveryRequestMessage, of the RR_REPLY type

Parameters:
msg - TOM message containing the request being recovered
from - ID of the process which sent the message

RequestRecoveryMessage

public RequestRecoveryMessage(byte[] hash,
                              int from,
                              int consId)
Creates a new instance of RecoveryRequestMessage, of the RR_DELIVERED type

Parameters:
hash - Hash of the request being recovered
from - ID of the process which sent the message
consId - Consensus's ID to which the request recover refers to
